p: Every publication in English that was reviewed for this study was extracted from the PubMed, Scopus, EMBASE, and Web of Science databases restricted to the Medical Subjects Headings Index (MeSH/DeCS) to April 2020. The search was based on different combinations of the following keywords: “essential oil”, “oils, essential,” “essential oils,” “volatile oils,” “inflammation,” “inflammations,” “innate inflammatory response,” “inflammatory response innate,” and “innate inflammatory responses.” Furthermore, we reviewed the references in the selected articles for additional reports not included in the original article search.
